Title: Pocket watch Chronometre good working order
Description: CHRONOMÉTRE POCKET WATCH INGOOD WORKING ORDER Description I present to your consideration this Chronométre pocket watch. The pocket watch has a two tones light beige color dial. The dial has a check effect with alternate smooth squares with squares full fill with vertical very small lines. The rear of the case has a very beautiful low relief composition of geometric elements. It is absolutely in the Art Deco spirit. The pocket watch is in very good working order. This pocket watch is an interesting item a good addition to any collection Please see the photos that are part of the description. Origin and manufacture year · Original Chronometer – made in Switzerland · Circa 1930’s Dial · Light beige enamel dial with an effect with alternate smooth squares with squares full fill with vertical very small lines · Black color Arabic numerals from 1 to 12. A smaller scale from 13 to 24 in dark blue color. Small gold color dots for the minutes · Black color hands (beautiful model) · Subsidiary second dial at 6 o´clock for the seconds. Numbers from 10 to 60 Inscription on the dial · Chronométre Dial conditions · In very good condition Movement · Manual wind up movement Movement condition · Movement in good working conditions Inscription on the movement · The serial number 6425 Case Case material · Cases silver color finish metal Case dimensions · The case measures 49mm (1.92in) diameter not including the crown/bow and 72mm (2.43in) with the crown/bow Case special features · One upper pin to wind up and to set the watch · In good condition. Only perceptible small scratches for the use Inscription on the case · «Deposé» in the back of the exterior case · «Ancre Remontoir levees visibles Balancier Compensé Spiral Breguet 15 rubis», in the inner cover Dial window · Glass cover Dial window condition · In good condition only noticeable a very small chip at 10 o´clock (very hardly noticeable) Payment method – PayPal I ship worldwide. I combine shipping for multiple purchases I will gladly answer any question you may have Please see take a look at my other items on eBay
